question: Which neuropsychiatric disorders are associated with 16p13.11 genomic copy number variants?
ideal_answer: schizophrenia, autism, mental retardation, ADHD, epilepsy

snippets.text: 16p13.11 genomic copy number variants are implicated in several neuropsychiatric disorders, such as schizophrenia, autism, mental retardation, ADHD and epilepsy.

exact_answer: schizophrenia, autism, mental retardation, ADHD, epilepsy
